title: Atomic Layer Etching Process Schema
description: A JSON schema representing the parameters and characteristics of the Atomic Layer Etching (ALE) process used in semiconductor fabrication.

processType.description: Type of ALE process, either plasma-based or thermal.

inputs.description: Inputs required for the ALE process.

chemicalPrecursors.description: List of chemical precursors used, e.g., Cl2, HF.

energySource.description: Type of energy source used, either thermal or plasma excitation.

substrateMaterial.description: Material of the substrate targeted for etching.

processParameters.description: Parameters that control the ALE process.

temperature.description: Temperature of the process in degrees Celsius.

pressure.description: Pressure inside the etching chamber in Pascals.

gasFlowRates.description: Flow rate of gases in the chamber measured in liters per minute.

plasmaPower.description: Power of plasma used in plasma-based ALE, measured in watts.

exposureTime.description: Time for which the substrate is exposed to precursors, measured in seconds.

etchedMaterial.description: Description of the material after etching.

byProducts.description: List of volatile compounds produced as by-products.

surfaceModifications.description: Chemical modifications to the surface post-etch.

simulationParameters.description: Parameters and observables relevant to ALE process simulation.

decompositionMechanisms.description: Details on decomposition and binding mechanisms in the ALE process.

excitationDynamics.description: Study of photon excitation effects on reaction mechanisms.

etchRate.description: Rate of etching, typically measured in nanometers per cycle.

surfaceDesorptionRates.description: Rates at which materials desorb from the surface during etching.

filmProperties.description: Properties of the film during the ALE process.

density.description: Density of the film in grams per cubic centimeter.

temperatureProfile.description: Temperature distribution across the film during etching.

chemicalComposition.description: Chemical composition of the film post-etching.
